name: part_009
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】hololive 5th Generation Live ＂Twinkle 4 You＂ 【#ねぽらぼT4U】 [RRH29-R71T0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: MC section between the hololive 5th generation members, featuring an "I love you" challenge and a penlight interaction with the audience.
Performance of the song "Let's Go!" by hololive 5th generation.

subtitles.original: Lamy: これも…ありがとう。じゃ、次…
subtitles.english: Lamy: Thank you for this, too. Now, next...

subtitles.original: Botan: 「愛してる！」で通り過ぎるからね。
subtitles.english: Botan: I'll pass by with "I love you!"

subtitles.original: Lamy: はい！せーの！
subtitles.english: Lamy: Okay! One, two!

subtitles.original: Group: ししろんしか！愛してる！
subtitles.english: Group: Only Shishiron! I love you!

subtitles.original: Lamy: すごいゆっくり…！
subtitles.english: Lamy: That was so slow!

subtitles.original: Botan: 恥ずかしいよ！
subtitles.english: Botan: This is embarrassing!

subtitles.original: Botan: もっと早く！もっと早さを感じたい！
subtitles.english: Botan: Faster! I want to feel more speed!

subtitles.original: Group: 愛してる！愛してる！
subtitles.english: Group: I love you! I love you!

subtitles.original: Lamy: じゃ、私も！私も！
subtitles.english: Lamy: Me too! Me too!

subtitles.original: Nene: よし、しらみ（しらみ）やろう！全員やろう！
subtitles.english: Nene: All right, let's do Shira-Mi! Everyone, let's go!

subtitles.original: Botan: じゃ、普段やんないけど…私も「愛してる」やりたいな。
subtitles.english: Botan: Well, I don't usually do it, but... I want to do "I love you" too.

subtitles.original: Botan: 普段やんないも〜ん。
subtitles.english: Botan: Because I don't usually do it.

subtitles.original: Botan: ししろんしか！愛してる！
subtitles.english: Botan: Only Shishiron! I love you!

subtitles.original: Polka: おいおいおい！仕様で取ります！めっちゃ早く行くからね！
subtitles.english: Polka: Hey hey hey! Let's do it like this! We're going super fast!

subtitles.original: Group: ししろんしか！愛してる！
subtitles.english: Group: Only Shishiron! I love you!

subtitles.original: Lamy: そんなに早くないですよ！
subtitles.english: Lamy: That wasn't that fast!

subtitles.original: Botan: 早くなかった？
subtitles.english: Botan: It wasn't fast?

subtitles.original: Polka: もっといける？もっといける？もっといける？
subtitles.english: Polka: Can we go more? Can we go more? Can we go more?

subtitles.original: Botan: クラウチングスタート！
subtitles.english: Botan: Crouching start!

subtitles.original: Group: ししろんしか！愛してる！
subtitles.english: Group: Only Shishiron! I love you!

subtitles.original: Botan: ふ〜！お待たせしました！
subtitles.english: Botan: Phew! Sorry for the wait!

subtitles.original: Lamy: じゃあ、次は…ポルカ？
subtitles.english: Lamy: Then next... Polka?

subtitles.original: Botan: ポルカは何でやるの？
subtitles.english: Botan: What will Polka do?

subtitles.original: Polka: ポルカ、おるか？じゃなくて…
subtitles.english: Polka: Is Polka here? No, wait...

subtitles.original: Polka: ポルカは普通に「わー！」で行くから。
subtitles.english: Polka: Polka will just go with "Waa!"

subtitles.original: Polka: ポルカがね、ここで一番最後にお手本見せるってわけ。
subtitles.english: Polka: Polka will show the example at the very end.

subtitles.original: Lamy: 最後にお手本見せるって…
subtitles.english: Lamy: Show the example at the end...

subtitles.original: Polka: 皆さん、まずペンライト赤ありがとうございます！そちらは…
subtitles.english: Polka: Everyone, first, thank you for the red penlights! Over there...

subtitles.original: Polka: まず皆さん、お手元の腕を下ろしていただいてから始めましょうか。
subtitles.english: Polka: First, everyone, please lower your arms before we start.

subtitles.original: Polka: じゃ、ポルカこっち走り去って行くから…
subtitles.english: Polka: Then, Polka will run away this way...

subtitles.original: Polka: …そのポルカが来るタイミングで上げるんだよ！最後だよ！
subtitles.english: Polka: ...and you raise them when Polka comes! This is the end!

subtitles.original: Group: せーの！わー！
subtitles.english: Group: One, two! Waa!

subtitles.original: Polka: はい完璧！みんな拍手！
subtitles.english: Polka: Yes, perfect! Everyone, applause!

subtitles.original: Polka: 自分に拍手！隣の人にも拍手して！
subtitles.english: Polka: Give yourselves a round of applause! And to the people next to you too!

subtitles.original: Polka: イェーイ！パチパチパチ！はい完璧。
subtitles.english: Polka: Yeah! *clap clap clap* Yes, perfect.

subtitles.original: Polka: じゃあ、ちょっと何か…満足したよね。
subtitles.english: Polka: Well, I'm kind of... satisfied now.

subtitles.original: Botan: 満足してないけどね！
subtitles.english: Botan: I'm not satisfied, though!

subtitles.original: Lamy: みんな疲れただろうから…
subtitles.english: Lamy: Everyone must be tired...

subtitles.original: Polka: お水飲んでな！お水飲んで！
subtitles.english: Polka: Drink some water! Drink some water!

subtitles.original: Polka: まぁ、言うてもライブだからね、歌もほら歌わないとだな。
subtitles.english: Polka: Well, it is a live concert, so we have to sing.

subtitles.original: Nene: あ、そうだった！そうだった！すみません、すみません、忘れてました！
subtitles.english: Nene: Ah, that's right! Sorry, sorry, I forgot!

subtitles.original: Nene: 皆様にちょっとお知らせなんですけど…何ですか？
subtitles.english: Nene: I have a bit of an announcement for everyone... What is it?

subtitles.original: Nene: しらみ（しらみ）の方、次の曲までに…
subtitles.english: Nene: For Shira-Mi, by the next song...

subtitles.original: Nene: …「チラ見せ」は終わりなんです！
subtitles.english: Nene: ...the "sneak peek" will be over!

subtitles.original: Botan: 最後まで見たい人はどうしたらいいんだろう？
subtitles.english: Botan: What should those who want to see until the end do?

subtitles.original: Lamy: えーと、最後まで見たい方はですね、概要欄の方チェックしてください。
subtitles.english: Lamy: Well, for those who want to see until the end, please check the description.

subtitles.original: Polka: 配信に向けてのお知らせです。
subtitles.english: Polka: That was an announcement for the stream.

subtitles.original: Polka: 現地はどれだけ盛り上がってるか、大きな元気な声聞かせてくれるかな？
subtitles.english: Polka: How hyped is the venue? Can I hear your loud, energetic voices?

subtitles.original: Polka: どうだ？！イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Polka: How is it?! Yeah!

subtitles.original: Polka: さ、これを聞くとネットもほら盛り上がってる！
subtitles.english: Polka: Hear that? The internet is hyped too!

subtitles.original: Lamy: 盛り上がってる！捌ききれないほど盛り上がっておりますですが…
subtitles.english: Lamy: It's hyped! It's so hyped we can't handle it, but...

subtitles.original: Polka: …次の曲は、じゃあめっちゃ盛り上げていこうぜ、ねね！
subtitles.english: Polka: ...for the next song, let's get super hyped, Nene!

subtitles.original: Nene: 行こうぜ！パンパカパン…
subtitles.english: Nene: Let's go! Ta-da!

subtitles.original: Polka: 話聞いてなかったでしょ今。 Nene: ねね！はい！
subtitles.english: Polka: You weren't listening, were you? Nene: Nene! Yes!

subtitles.original: Polka: 感謝してる場合じゃねえです。あのね…
subtitles.english: Polka: This is no time to be feeling thankful. Look...

subtitles.original: Polka: …無料パート最後だから思いっきり盛り上げていきましょう！
subtitles.english: Polka: ...it's the end of the free part, so let's get hyped to the max!

subtitles.original: Polka: 最初は、ねね・ポルカメインで歌うから…
subtitles.english: Polka: First, Nene and Polka will sing mainly...

subtitles.original: Polka: …しらみがダンスで参加してもらいます！
subtitles.english: Polka: ...and Shira-Mi will join in with dance!

subtitles.original: Botan: お、じゃあねねちゃん行ってくれるかな？
subtitles.english: Botan: Oh, then Nene-chan, will you lead us?

subtitles.original: Nene: はい！それじゃあ早速次の曲、聞いてください。せーの！ Let's Go!
subtitles.english: Nene: Yes! Well then, please listen to the next song. Ready? Let's Go!

subtitles.original: Yeah! Ra-ra-ra-mi-ne... Botan... Polka! Oh yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah! Ra-ra-ra-mi-ne... Botan... Polka! Oh yeah!

subtitles.original: Let's Go Jumpin' Jumpin' Now! Da-da-da-ba-ra-ra-ra-pa!
subtitles.english: Let's Go Jumpin' Jumpin' Now! Da-da-da-ba-ra-ra-ra-pa!

subtitles.original: Let's Go Jumpin' Jumpin' Jump!
subtitles.english: Let's Go Jumpin' Jumpin' Jump!

subtitles.original: Let's Go Jumpin' Jumpin' Ban!
subtitles.english: Let's Go Jumpin' Jumpin' Ban!

subtitles.original: 子供だましのmathematica...
subtitles.english: A child's trick of mathematica...

subtitles.original: 割れ電卓そんなんでプライドがない！
subtitles.english: A broken calculator, no pride in that!

subtitles.original: Clipping motion 一人で...
subtitles.english: Clipping motion, all alone...

subtitles.original: そこ見る見物分ばかりじゃつまんね！
subtitles.english: Just watching from there is boring!

subtitles.original: ほらぼっち、間違ってちょっと...
subtitles.english: Hey, loner, make a little mistake...

subtitles.original: 退屈に手をかけて...
subtitles.english: Laying hands on boredom...

subtitles.original: Um-ma-ma! やっぱ私は...
subtitles.english: Um-ma-ma! After all, I...

subtitles.original: こんなところじゃ終われない！
subtitles.english: Can't end in a place like this!

subtitles.original: ムムでlook 気が触れた...
subtitles.english: Look with a frown, gone mad...

subtitles.original: ごっこ遊びも芝居もさよなら！
subtitles.english: Goodbye to make-believe and acting!

subtitles.original: ずっとこのままなんてさ！
subtitles.english: Staying like this forever is...

subtitles.original: 色んなようだった…私大人になる！
subtitles.english: I was many things... I'm becoming an adult!

subtitles.original: 酸いも甘いも噛み締めて今...
subtitles.english: Tasting both the bitter and the sweet now...

subtitles.original: Ba-ba-ba 変わる時代...
subtitles.english: Ba-ba-ba, changing times...

subtitles.original: 悪いことばかりじゃないでしょ？
subtitles.english: It's not all bad things, right?

subtitles.original: どこまでも、今も、集め...
subtitles.english: Everywhere, even now, gather...

subtitles.original: 全て、全て、愛して...
subtitles.english: Love everything, everything...

subtitles.original: 生きてやり返すわ！ Yeah!
subtitles.english: I'll live and get back at them! Yeah!

subtitles.original: 挑発 私たちはのdance!
subtitles.english: Provocation, our dance!

subtitles.original: 緑のあいつにばっかかまってね...
subtitles.english: Don't just pay attention to that green guy...

subtitles.original: 像パンダ道なったらもらえる合格！
subtitles.english: If I become like an elephant, I'll pass!

subtitles.original: 赤さえ入れておけばダメなんですか？
subtitles.english: Is it no good if I just add red?

subtitles.original: 酒お待たせら…やっちゃって…！
subtitles.english: Wait for the sake... just do it...!
